comment: Hello, We're new to Gab, just have had my final straw with and his FASCIST NAZIS at Twitter. Our associated website is www.ChangeWeCanBelieveIn.com is the !
amr:
# ::snt Hello, We're new to Gab, just have had my final straw with and his FASCIST NAZIS at Twitter. Our associated website is www.ChangeWeCanBelieveIn.com is the !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hello
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (n / new-02
            :ARG1 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Gab")))
      :snt3 (h2 / have-03
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / straw
                  :poss ii
                  :mod (f / final))
            :prep-with (a / and
                  :op1 (p2 / person
                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Fascism"))
                        :poss p)
                  :op2 (p3 / person
                        :mod (p4 / political-movement
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Nazism"))
                        :poss p2))
            :mod (j / just)
            :location (p5 / publication
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Twitter")))
      :snt4 (w2 / website
            :domain (u / url-entity
                  :value "www.ChangeWeCanBelieveIn.com")
            :ARG1-of (a2 / associate-01
                  :ARG2 (w3 / we))))

comment: Hi, Racist and homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Hi, Racist and homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (a2 / and
                              :op1 (r / racist)
                              :op2 (h / homophobia))))
            :op2 (h2 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r2 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 s)))
      :snt2 (r3 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :mod (t / type
                        :mod (t2 / this))))
      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))
